benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoiceItems/{invoiceItemId}/customFields - Add custom fields to invoice item

covered: Valid Payload: Scenarios @TC01, @TC02, @TC03, @TC04, @TC10, @TC12, @TC14, @TC15, @TC18, @TC19, @TC20, @TC21, @TC24, @TC25 ensure successful creation with valid data and headers.
Empty Response: @TC10 covers the case of an empty array request body.
Invalid Payload: @TC08, @TC09, @TC21 cover malformed JSON, missing body, and injection attempts.
Non-Existent Invoice Item: @TC05, @TC23 cover invalid or missing invoice item IDs.
System Error Handling: @TC13 simulates service unavailability.
Large Payloads: @TC14 tests maximum allowed custom fields.
Response Time: @TC15 addresses performance within acceptable thresholds.
Regression: @TC17 tests for duplicate custom field names.
Integration: @TC18 verifies persistence and retrieval of custom fields.
Edge Cases: @TC19, @TC20, @TC21 cover maximum/minimum lengths, special characters, and injection attempts.
State Variations: @TC22, @TC23 cover empty and partially populated databases.
Degraded Performance & Recovery: @TC24, @TC25 simulate system under load and network issues.
gaps: Pagination: No tests cover handling of large datasets requiring pagination.
Caching Behavior: No scenarios test for caching headers like ETag or Cache-Control.
Rate Limiting: No tests simulate multiple rapid requests to verify throttling.
Specific validation for custom field value formats (e.g., date, numeric ranges) is missing.
No explicit tests for handling extra/unknown parameters in the request body beyond optional comments.
No tests for detailed validation of custom field names/values with special characters or injection patterns beyond basic injection attempts.
recommendations: Add tests for pagination to ensure proper handling of large datasets.
Include scenarios verifying caching headers and cache invalidation.
Implement rate limiting/throttling tests to verify system robustness under load.
Add validation tests for specific custom field value formats and constraints.
Create tests for handling extra or unknown parameters in request payloads.
Enhance validation for special characters and injection prevention in custom field data.
